content: acorn streetlamp these adorable acorn streetlamps are sure to add whimsy and joy to your christmas tree they also look darling on a wreath or make a wonderful addition to a seasonal display they are knit entirely in the round from the bottom up on dpns the candle is made with simple embroidery and the ends stuffed inside a handle is made using the cast off end and the pole is made with either a toothpick or a branch that slides into place i have always loved streetlamps how wonderful it must have been to see a lamplighter light them at sunset copyright 2024 by natasha hanson all
